description:
Microsoft Excel 2016 Intermediate Training Course

This course is designed for people with some limited experience of using PowerPoint 2016.  It will also suit people who has studied my Excel 2016 Foundation level course.

The course starts by looking at Excel 2016 Setup & Printing Issues

We then start looking at Excel Functions and Formulas including Time & Date Functions, Mathematical Functions, Logical Functions, Mathematical Functions, Statistical Functions, Text Functions, Financial Functions, Lookup Functions and finally Database Functions

Next we see how to create and use Named Ranges within an Excel worksheet.

The next chapter shows you how to use Cell Formatting techniques.

Then we see the various Worksheets manipulation techniques.

Finally we look at the use of Excel Templates and the Excel Paste Special Options.
title: Excel 2016 Intermediate Training Course | Video Tutorial
